channel.title: PLEASE! How can i stop people mass clicking attack?
channel.description:
They hit so fast..i want them to hit like a normal whip, lioke once every 2 seconds or something
Ty in advance

item.title: PLEASE! How can i stop people mass clicking attack?
item.dc:creator: @pmgz pmgz
item.description:
@pmgz wrote:

now replace ur boolean attacknpc with this

[code]public boolean AttackNPC() {
int offsetX = (absX - EnemyX) * -1;
int offsetY = (absY - EnemyY) * -1;
int EnemyX = server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].absX;
int EnemyY = server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].absY;
int EnemyX2 = server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].absX;
int EnemyY2 = server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].absY;
int EnemyHP = server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].HP;
int hitDiff = 0;
int Npchitdiff = 0;
int wepdelay = 0;
CalculateMaxHit();
hitDiff = misc.random(playerMaxHit);
faceNPC(attacknpc);
//viewTo(server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].absX, server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].absY);

if(server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].followPlayer < 1 || server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].followPlayer == playerId || inwildy2 == true) {
/MELEE WEAPONS/
/----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------/
/DAGGERS/

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (1205) //bronze
|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (1203) //iron
|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (1207) //steel
|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (1217) //black
|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (1209) //mithril
|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (1211) //adamant
|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (1213) //rune
|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (1215) //dragon
|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (1221) //bronze§
|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (1219) //iron§
|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (1223) //steel§
|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (1233) //black§
|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (1225) //mithril§
|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (1227) //adamant§
|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (1229) //rune§
|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (1231) //dragon§
|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (5670) //bronze(+)
|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (5668) //iron(+)
|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (5672) //steel(+)
|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (5682) //black(+)
|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (5674) //mithril(+)
|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (5676) //adamant(+)
|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (5678) //rune(+)
|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (5680) //dragon(+)
|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (5688) //bronze(++)
|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (5686) //iron(++)
|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (5690) //steel(++)
|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (5700) //black(++)
|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (5692) //mithril(++)
|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (5694) //adamant(++)
|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (5696) //rune(++)
|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (5698) //dragon(++)
|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (6525)) //Toktz-xil-ek
{
PkingDelay = 3;
wepdelay = 3;
}

		/*AXES*/

else if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (1351) //bronze
|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (1349) //iron
|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (1353) //steel
|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (1361) //black
|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (1355) //mithril
|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (1357) //adamant
|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (1359) //rune
|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (6739)) //dragon
{
PkingDelay = 3;
wepdelay = 3;
}

		/*MACES*/

else if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (1422) //bronze
|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (1420) //iron
|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (1424) //steel
|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (1426) //black
|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (1428) //mithril
|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (1430) //adamant
|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (1432) //rune
|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (1434) //dragon
|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (6527)) //Tzhaar-ket-em
{
PkingDelay = 3;
wepdelay = 3;
}

		/*SHORT SWORDS*/

else if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (1277) //bronze
|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (1279) //iron
|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (1281) //steel
|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (1283) //black
|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (1285) //mithril
|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (1287) //adamant
|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (1289)) //rune
{
PkingDelay = 3;
wepdelay = 3;
}

		/*SCIMITARS*/

else if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (1321) //bronze
|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (1323) //iron
|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (1325) //steel
|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (1327) //black
|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (1329) //mithril
|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (1331) //adamant
|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (1333) //rune
|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (4587)) //dragon
{
PkingDelay = 2;
wepdelay = 2;
}

		/*LONG SWORDS*/

else if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (1291) //bronze
|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (1293) //iron
|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (1295) //steel
|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (1297) //black
|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (1299) //mithril
|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (1301) //adamant
|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (1303) //rune
|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (1305)) //dragon
{
PkingDelay = 4;
wepdelay = 4;
}

		/*PICK AXES*/

else if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (1265) //bronze
|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (1267) //iron
|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (1269) //steel
|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (1273) //mithril
|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (1271) //adamant
|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (1275)) //rune
{
PkingDelay = 4;
wepdelay = 4;
}

		/*SPEARS*/

else if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (1237) //bronze
|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (1239) //iron
|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (1241) //steel
|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (4580) //black
|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (1243) //mithril
|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (1245) //adamant
|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (1247) //rune
|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (1249) //dragon
|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (1251) //bronze§
|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (1253) //iron§
|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (1255) //steel§
|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (4582) //black§
|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (1257) //mithril§
|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (1259) //adamant§
|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (1261) //rune§
|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (1263) //dragon§
|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (5704) //bronze(+)
|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (5706) //iron(+)
|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (5708) //steel(+)
|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (5734) //black(+)
|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (5710) //mithril(+)
|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (5712) //adamant(+)
|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (5714) //rune(+)
|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (5716) //dragon(+)
|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (5718) //bronze(++)
|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (5720) //iron(++)
|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (5722) //steel(++)
|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (5736) //black(++)
|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (5724) //mithril(++)
|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (5726) //adamant(++)
|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (5728) //rune(++)
|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (5730)) //dragon(++))
{
PkingDelay = 5;
wepdelay = 5;
}

			/*WAR HAMMERS*/

else if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (1337) //bronze
|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (1335) //iron
|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (1339) //steel
|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (1341) //black
|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (1343) //mithril
|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (1345) //adamant
|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (1347)) //rune
{
PkingDelay = 5; //5
wepdelay = 5;
}

			/*BATTLE AXES*/

else if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (1375) //bronze
|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (1363) //iron
|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (1365) //steel
|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (1367) //black
|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (1369) //mithril
|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (1371) //adamant
|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (1373) //rune
|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (1377)) //dragon
{
PkingDelay = 6; //5
wepdelay = 6;
}

			/*2Handed Swords*/

else if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (1307) //bronze
|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (1309) //iron
|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (1311) //steel
|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (1313) //black
|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (1315) //mithril
|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (1317) //adamant
|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (1319) //rune
|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (7158)) //dragon
{
PkingDelay = 6;
wepdelay = 6;
}

			/*HALBERDS*/

else if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (3190) //bronze
|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (3192) //iron
|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (3194) //steel
|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (3196) //black
|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (3198) //mithril
|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (3200) //adamant
|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (3202) //rune
|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (3204)) //dragon
{
PkingDelay = 7;
wepdelay = 7;
}

			/*MISC WEAPONS (Fast)*/

else if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (4151)) //Whip
{
PkingDelay = 2;
wepdelay = 2;
}

			/*MISC WEAPONS (Slow)*/

else if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (4153) //Granite Maul
|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (4158) //Leaf-Bladed Spear
|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (6528)) //Tzhaar-ket-om
{
PkingDelay = 6;
wepdelay = 6;
}

							/*MAGIC WEAPONS*/

/----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------/

				/*STAFFS*/

else if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (84) //Staff_of_armadyl
|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (772) //Dramen_staff
|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (1379) //Staff
|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (1381) //Staff of air
|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (1383) //Staff of water
|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (1385) //Staff of earth
|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (1387) //Staff of fire
|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (1389) //Magical Staff
|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (1391) //BattleStaff
|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (1397) //BattleStaff of air
|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (1395) //BattleStaff of water
|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (1399) //BattleStaff of earth
|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (1393) //BattleStaff of fire
|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (1405) //Mystic AirStaff
|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (1403) //Mystic WaterStaff
|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (1407) //Mystic EarthStaff
|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (1401) //Mystic FireStaff
|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (1409) //Ibans Staff
|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (2415) //Saradomin Staff
|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (2414) //Zamorak Staff
|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (2416) //Guthix Staff
|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (3053) //Lava BattleStaff
|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (3054) //Mystic Lava BattleStaff
|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (4170) //Slayer Staff
|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (4675) //Ancient Staff
|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (4710) //Ahrims Staff
|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (6526)) //Toktz-mej-tal
{
PkingDelay = 4;
wepdelay = 4;
LoopHitDelay = 9;
}

				/*WANDS*/

else if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (6908) //Beginner wand
|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (6910) //Apprentice wand
|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (6912) //Teacher wand
|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (6915)) //Master wand
{
PkingDelay = 4;
wepdelay = 4;
LoopHitDelay = 9;
}

							/*BARROWS*/

/----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------/

				/*BARROW WEAPONS*/

else if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (4718) //Dharoks_greataxe
|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (4726) //Guthans_warspear
|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (4734) //Karils_crossbow
|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (4755) //Veracs_flail
|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (4747)) //Torags_hammers
{
PkingDelay = 8;
wepdelay = 8;
LoopHitDelay = 13;
}

boolean UseBow = false;
if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4214)
{
PkingDelay = 6;
wepdelay = 6;
UseBow = true;
}

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 861)
{
PkingDelay = 3;
wepdelay = 3;
UseBow = true;
}

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 859)
{
PkingDelay = 3;
wepdelay = 3;
UseBow = true;
}
if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4734)
{
PkingDelay = 3;
wepdelay = 3;
UseBow = true;
}
if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 839 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 841 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 843 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 845 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 847 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 849 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 851 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 853 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 855 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 857)
{
PkingDelay = 3;
wepdelay = 3;
UseBow = true;
}

if(UseBow){
inCombat();
teleportToX = absX;
teleportToY = absY;
CheckArrows();
CalculateRange();
hitDiff = misc.random(playerMaxHit);
if (hitDiff > 25) {
hitDiff = 5 + misc.random(20);
}
}

else
{
PkingDelay = 10;
wepdelay = 10;
}

	if (GoodDistance(EnemyX, EnemyY, absX, absY, 1) == true || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 859  || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4734 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 861 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4214 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 839 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 841 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 843 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 845 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 847 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 849 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 851 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 853 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 855 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 857) {
		if (LoopAttDelay <= 1) {
			if (server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].IsDead == true) {
				ResetAttackNPC();
			} else if(!UseBow) {
				//actionAmount++;
				setAnimation(GetWepAnim());                                       
				if ((EnemyHP - hitDiff) < 0) {
					hitDiff = EnemyHP;
				}
                                    LoopAttDelay = PkingDelay+1;
				server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].hitDiff = hitDiff;
				server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].Killing[playerId] += hitDiff;
				server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].updateRequired = true;
				server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].hitUpdateRequired = true;
				double TotalExp = 0;
                                    inCombat();
				if (FightType != 3) {
					TotalExp = (double)(200 * hitDiff);
					TotalExp = (double)(TotalExp * CombatExpRate);
					addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), SkillID);
				} else {
					TotalExp = (double)(200 * hitDiff);
					TotalExp = (double)(TotalExp * CombatExpRate);
					addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerAttack);
					addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerDefence);
					addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerStrength);
				}
				TotalExp = (double)(200 * hitDiff);
				TotalExp = (double)(TotalExp * CombatExpRate);
				addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerHitpoints);
				actionTimer = 4;
                                    server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].animNumber = server.npcHandler.GetNPCBlockAnim(server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].npcType);
                                    }
                                    else if(UseBow){

if(!HasArrows){
sendMessage(“There’s no arrows left in your quiver”);
ResetAttack();
}
else if(HasArrows){
DeleteArrow();
DropArrowsNPC();

int casterX = absX;
int casterY = absY;
teleportToX = absX;
teleportToY = absY;
LoopAttDelay = PkingDelay+3;
setAnimation(GetWepAnim());
server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].hitDiff = hitDiff;
server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].Killing[playerId] += hitDiff;
server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].updateRequired = true;
server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].hitUpdateRequired = true;
double TotalExp = 0;
TotalExp = (double)(200 * hitDiff);
TotalExp = (double)(TotalExp * CombatExpRate);
addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerRanged);
TotalExp = (double)(200 * hitDiff);
TotalExp = (double)(TotalExp * CombatExpRate);
addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerHitpoints);
inCombat();
teleportToX = absX;
teleportToY = absY;
actionTimer = 4;
server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].animNumber = server.npcHandler.GetNPCBlockAnim(server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].npcType);
}
}

			return true;
		}
	}
        }

else {
sendMessage(“You can’t attack a player’s summoned npc!”);
}
return false;
}[/code]
and ur all done lol

|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (1329) //mithril
|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (1331) //adamant
|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (1333) //rune
|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (4587)) //dragon
{
PkingDelay = 2;
wepdelay = 2;
LoopHitDelay = 2;
}

		/*LONG SWORDS*/

else if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (1291) //bronze
|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (1293) //iron
|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (1295) //steel
|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (1297) //black

		/*PICK AXES*/

else if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (1265) //bronze

}

		/*SPEARS*/

else if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (1237) //bronze
|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (1239) //iron

|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (5704) //bronze(+)

|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (5718) //bronze(++)

|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (5730)) //dragon(++))
{

wepdelay = 2;
LoopHitDelay = 2;
}

			/*WAR HAMMERS*/

else if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (1337) //bronze
|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (1335) //iron
|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (1339) //steel

{

wepdelay = 2;
LoopHitDelay = 2;
}

			/*BATTLE AXES*/

else if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (1375) //bronze
|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (1363) //iron
|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (1365) //steel
|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (1367) //black

|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (1373) //rune
|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (1377)) //dragon
{
PkingDelay = 2; //5
wepdelay = 2;
LoopHitDelay = 2;
}

			/*2Handed Swords*/

else if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (1307) //bronze
|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (1309) //iron
|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (1311) //steel

|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (1317) //adamant
|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (1319) //rune
|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (7158)) //dragon
{

wepdelay = 2;

}

			/*HALBERDS*/

else if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (3190) //bronze
|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (3192) //iron
|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (3194) //steel
|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (3196) //black

|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (3200) //adamant
|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (3202) //rune
|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (3204)) //dragon
{
PkingDelay = 2;
wepdelay = 2;
LoopHitDelay = 2;
}

			/*MISC WEAPONS (Fast)*/

else if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (4151)) //Whip
{
PkingDelay = 2;
wepdelay = 2;
LoopHitDelay = 2;
}

			/*MISC WEAPONS (Slow)*/

else if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (4153) //Granite Maul
|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (4158) //Leaf-Bladed Spear
|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (6528)) //Tzhaar-ket-om
{
PkingDelay = 2;
wepdelay = 2;
LoopHitDelay = 2;
}

							/*MAGIC WEAPONS*/

/----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------/

				/*STAFFS*/

else if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (84) //Staff_of_armadyl
|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (772) //Dramen_staff
|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (1379) //Staff
|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (1381) //Staff of air
|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (1383) //Staff of water
|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (1385) //Staff of earth
|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (1387) //Staff of fire
|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (1389) //Magical Staff
|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (1391) //BattleStaff
|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (1397) //BattleStaff of air
|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (1395) //BattleStaff of water
|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (1399) //BattleStaff of earth
|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (1393) //BattleStaff of fire
|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (1405) //Mystic AirStaff
|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (1403) //Mystic WaterStaff
|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (1407) //Mystic EarthStaff

|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (2414) //Zamorak Staff

|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (3054) //Mystic Lava BattleStaff
|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (4170) //Slayer Staff
|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (4675) //Ancient Staff
|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (4710) //Ahrims Staff
|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (6526)) //Toktz-mej-tal
{
PkingDelay = 2;
wepdelay = 2;
LoopHitDelay = 2;
}

				/*WANDS*/

else if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (6908) //Beginner wand
|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (6910) //Apprentice wand
|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (6912) //Teacher wand
|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (6915)) //Master wand
{
PkingDelay = 2;
wepdelay = 2;
LoopHitDelay = 2;
}

							/*BARROWS*/

/----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------/

				/*BARROW WEAPONS*/

else if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (4718) //Dharoks_greataxe
|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (4726) //Guthans_warspear
|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (4734) //Karils_crossbow
|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (4755) //Veracs_flail
|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (4747)) //Torags_hammers
{
PkingDelay = 2;
wepdelay = 2;
LoopHitDelay = 2;
}

boolean UseBow = false;
if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4214)
{
PkingDelay = 2;
wepdelay = 2;
UseBow = true;
}

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 861)
{
PkingDelay = 2;
wepdelay = 2;
UseBow = true;
}

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 859)
{
PkingDelay = 2;
wepdelay = 2;
UseBow = true;
}

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4734)
{
PkingDelay = 2;
wepdelay = 2;
UseBow = true;
}

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 839 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 841 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 843 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 845 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 847 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 849 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 851 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 853 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 855 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 857)
{
PkingDelay = 2;
wepdelay = 2;
UseBow = true;
}

if(UseBow){
inCombat();
teleportToX = absX;
teleportToY = absY;
CheckArrows();
CalculateRange();
hitDiff = misc.random(playerMaxHit);
}

else
{
PkingDelay = 3;
wepdelay = 3;
}

                            if(nonWild() || AttackingOn2.nonWild()) {
                                                              sendMessage("This player is in a safe zone and cannot be attacked");
							 ResetAttack();
                             }
                            else if(!nonWild() && !AttackingOn2.nonWild()){
	if (GoodDistance(EnemyX, EnemyY, absX, absY, 1) == true || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 859  || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4734 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 861 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4214 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 839 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 841 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 843 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 845 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 6563 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 847 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 849 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 851 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 853 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 855 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 857) {
	  if (LoopAttDelay <= 1) {
	    if (!nonWild() && !AttackingOn2.nonWild()) {
		if (RingOfLife == true && EnemyHP <= (int)((double)((double)getLevelForXP(EnemyHPExp) / 10.0) + 0.5)) {
			PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].SafeMyLife = true;
		} else {
			if (PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].IsDead == true) {
				ResetAttack();
			} else if(!UseBow && pkingTimer <= 1){
				//actionAmount++;
				//setAnimation(playerSEA);
				PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].hitUpdateRequired = true;
				PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].updateRequired = true;
				PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
                                    if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 5698) {
                                    AttackingOn2.PoisonPlayer();
                                    hitDiff = misc.random(playerMaxHit);
				PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].hitUpdateRequired = true;
				PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].updateRequired = true;
				PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
                                    }                                      
                                    AttackingOn2.KillerId = playerId;
                                    AttackingOn2.inCombat();
                                    setAnimation(GetWepAnim());                                    
                                    AttackingOn2.setAnimation(GetBlockAnim(AttackingOn2.playerEquipment[playerWeapon]));
                                    LoopAttDelay = PkingDelay+4;
				if ((EnemyHP - hitDiff) < 0) {
					hitDiff = EnemyHP;
				}                                      
                                    addSkillXP(hitDiff, 3);
				PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].hitDiff = hitDiff;
				ResetCmb();
                                    LoopAttDelay = PkingDelay+4;
				PkingDelay = wepdelay+4;
			} 
                             else if(UseBow){

if(!HasArrows){
sendMessage(“There’s no arrows left in your quiver”);
ResetAttack();
}

else if(HasArrows){
int casterX = absX;
int casterY = absY;
DeleteArrow();
DropArrows();
setAnimation(GetWepAnim());
PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].hitUpdateRequired = true;
PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].updateRequired = true;
PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
AttackingOn2.KillerId = playerId;
AttackingOn2.inCombat();
inCombat();
teleportToX = absX;
teleportToY = absY;
AttackingOn2.setAnimation(GetBlockAnim(AttackingOn2.playerEquipment[playerWeapon]));
LoopAttDelay = PkingDelay+4;
if ((EnemyHP - hitDiff) <0) {
hitDiff = EnemyHP;
}
addSkillXP(hitDiff, 3);
PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].hitDiff = hitDiff;
ResetCmb();
PkingDelay = wepdelay = 4;
}
}
}
return true;
} else {
sendMessage(“This player is in a safe zone and cannot be attacked”);
ResetAttack();
}
}
}}
return false;
}[/code]

item.title: PLEASE! How can i stop people mass clicking attack?
item.dc:creator: @pmgz pmgz
item.description:
@pmgz wrote:

gimme a sec

ok follow all these steps

ok open up you client.java and find…

public boolean process()

change that to…

 public void process()

then find…

return PacketProcess();

and delete it…

then declare this boolean…

public boolean packetSending() { //Ringer24: this is used for sending packets return packetProcess(); }

now in player.java find…

public abstract boolean process();

replace it with these 2…

public abstract void process(); public abstract boolean packetSending();

now open your playerhandler.java and find…

while(players[i].process());

replace it with…

players[i].process(); while(players[i].packetSending());

Then add this to your void process

long timeSpent = System.currentTimeMillis()-lastProcess; //stop rapid clicking to speed up timers if(timeSpent >= server.cycleTime) { timeSpent = server.cycleTime; lastProcess = System.currentTimeMillis(); }
While your there add this also

if (LoopHitDelay >= 0){ LoopHitDelay -= 1; }

Add this long with your ints. long lastProcess = System.currentTimeMillis();

now also add this int public int LoopHitDelay = 0;

also add these public int EnemyY = 0; public int EnemyX = 0;

add these voids public void DropArrows() { int EnemyX = PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].absX; int EnemyY = PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].absY; if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] != 4214 && playerEquipmentN[playerArrows] != 0) if (ItemHandler.itemAmount(playerEquipment[playerArrows], EnemyX, EnemyY) == 0) { ItemHandler.addItem(playerEquipment[playerArrows], EnemyX, EnemyY, 1, playerId, false); } else if (ItemHandler.itemAmount(playerEquipment[playerArrows], EnemyX, EnemyY) != 0) { int amount = ItemHandler.itemAmount(playerEquipment[playerArrows], EnemyX, EnemyY); ItemHandler.removeItem(playerEquipment[playerArrows], EnemyX, EnemyY, amount); ItemHandler.addItem(playerEquipment[playerArrows], EnemyX, EnemyY, amount + 1, playerId, false); } } public void DropArrowsNPC() { int EnemyX = server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].absX; int EnemyY = server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].absY; if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] != 4214 && playerEquipmentN[playerArrows] != 0) if (ItemHandler.itemAmount(playerEquipment[playerArrows], EnemyX, EnemyY) == 0) { ItemHandler.addItem(playerEquipment[playerArrows], EnemyX, EnemyY, 1, playerId, false); } else if (ItemHandler.itemAmount(playerEquipment[playerArrows], EnemyX, EnemyY) != 0) { int amount = ItemHandler.itemAmount(playerEquipment[playerArrows], EnemyX, EnemyY); ItemHandler.removeItem(playerEquipment[playerArrows], EnemyX, EnemyY, amount); ItemHandler.addItem(playerEquipment[playerArrows], EnemyX, EnemyY, amount + 1, playerId, false); } }

1/2 done cant post so much shit
